item.title: Swingers Club: How YouTube Made Golf Cool Again
item.description: With loose-vibes videos showing off player personality (and sometimes cleavage), the platform has reinvented the way golf is consumed for a new generation.

item.title: The Tweens Down Under: Life Without Social Media in Australia
item.description: As Australia rolls out a ban on social media for kids under 16, tech companies face steep fines and teens face life without TikTok, Instagram, and other platforms. Will it work?

item.title: ‘Cheapfake’ AI Celeb Videos Are Rage-Baiting People on YouTube
item.description: WIRED found over 100 YouTube channels using AI to create lazy fanfiction-style videos. Despite being obviously fake, there’s a psychological reason people are falling for them.
